changeGroupAdmin(uint256,address).details: Wraps Semaphore's updateGroupAdmin. The new admin must later call acceptGroupAdmin.

returns._0: True if the member exists, false otherwise.

changeGroupAdmin(uint256,address).notice: Initiates a group admin update in Semaphore. Current group admin must call this.

isGroupMember(uint256,uint256).notice: function to check if an identity commitment is member of a group.Returns true if the identity commitment exists in the Semaphore group.
